blogPost.title:
Over the last 25 years, IBM has bought back $165 billion of its stock.

Its current market cap: $104 billion. $IBM https://t.co/00kJaYvrtg
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text:
在过去的25年里，IBM已经回购了1650亿美元的股票。

其目前市值：1040亿美元。IBM https://t.co/00kJaYvrtg

在過去的25年裏，IBM已經回購了1650億美元的股票。

其目前市值：1040億美元。IBM https://t.co/00kJaYvrtg

previous.excerpt:
I've been mainly lurking for a few years and in my opinion, there are currently
a few issues regarding this subreddit:



 * too much publicity

WSB was originally a small community of autists wanting to make big gains with
smart plays. Today WSB is more like an open discussion board, that's all…

我主要潜伏了几年，在我看来，目前有

聪明的游戏。今天的WSB更像是一个开放的讨论区，就这样... ...

localize.full_text:
美联储：我们需要继续购买债券，并将利息维持在0%的水平上许多年，以便为资产价格提供汁液，并导致更高的通货膨胀。

债券市场：你响了？https://t.co/JZULJu6WzX

美聯儲：我們需要繼續購買債券，並將利息維持在0%的水平上許多年，以便爲資產價格提供汁液，並導致更高的通貨膨脹。

債券市場：你響了？https://t.co/JZULJu6WzX
